the link is not available for public visit, because it's a private message I sent to Grahame Grieve on the community site, It's content can be found at:
https://gforge.hl7.org/gf/project/fhir/tracker/?action=TrackerItemEdit&tracker_item_id=23809

Hi Tery: I am reading your tracker. Can you specify this one
3.1 RESTful API : There are tow “return value” duplication at the last three paragraph in the section 3.1.0.9.
@Lloyd McKenzie Tery found many typoes in R4/CI build. Should I split this tracker to corresponding WGs?

Sorry about my slip of pen, I mean "two"not "tow":

If the search fails (cannot be executed, not that there are no matches), the return value return value SHALL be a status code 4xx or 5xx with an OperationOutcome.
